name: Up to Eleven (Web)
description:
A small project, loosely based on the 15-puzzle. I took the old concept and made things a little more complicated. 

Test your logic in a single mode  and challenge your friends in a good old hotseat 2-players mode.  Try the new trial mode (ver. 1.00 update) and share your solved puzzles and results.

Feel free to play in a browser (mobile devices are not supported) and leave feedback.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Music: Gnossienne No. 2 by Erik Satie (performed by flutist / distributed by audiojungle)

Developed by Dmitry Latash

The version for Windows is here

Contact me via twitter @Play_UptoEleven
